# Examples Overview

Practical usage examples of the NovelAI API.

*   **[Character Reference](./character-reference.md)**: Keeping character appearance consistent.
*   **[Multi-Character](./multi-character.md)**: Positioning multiple characters correctly.
*   **[ControlNet](./controlnet.md)**: Controlling composition, pose, or vibe.
*   **[Streaming Generation](./streaming.md)**: Real-time generation feedback.
*   **[Image-to-Image](./image-to-image.md)**: Generating based on an input image.
